asgn1Query

Class Log

  • java.lang.Object
    • asgn1Query.Log

  • public class Log
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to support logging of Collections and Queries
    Author:
    hogan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Log()
      Constructor establishes a log file based on the current time in the canonical directory

    • Constructor Detail

      • Log

        public Log()
    throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor establishes a log file based on the current time in the canonical directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if log file or BufferedWriter cannot be created

    • Method Detail

      • writeCollection

        public void writeCollection(Collection c,
                   boolean showListings,
                   boolean showKeywords,
                   boolean showKeyVectors)
                     throws QueryException,
                            java.io.IOException
        Logs the basic snapshot of the collection
        Parameters:
        c - Collection to be logged
        showListings - boolean choose to record the listings; if false, the next two parameters are ignored.
        showKeywords - boolean choose to record listing keywords
        showKeyVectors - boolean choose to record listing keyVectors
        Throws:
        QueryException - if isNull(c)
        java.io.IOException - propagated from BufferedWriter.write()

      • writeKeywords

        Logs the basic snapshot of the collection method
        Parameters:
        c - Collection to be logged
        Throws:
        QueryException - if isNull(c)
        java.io.IOException - propagated from BufferedWriter.write()
